Copernicus Global Land Cover Service (CG.metodologia: Supervised random forest classification/regression with PROBA-V data.
Copernicus Global Land Cover Service (CG.cobertura: Global coverage with annual updates from 2015-2019.
Copernicus Global Land Cover Service (CG.legends: Forest, shrubland, herbaceous vegetation, herbaceous wetland, moss and lichen, bare/sparse vegetation, cropland, urban/built-up, snow and ice, and permanent water bodies

Dynamic World (GDW).metodologia: Deep learning fully convolutional network applied to Sentinel-2 data.
Dynamic World (GDW).validacao: Reference System: Not Informed. Overall Accuracy: ≥ 73.8%.
Dynamic World (GDW).cobertura: Global coverage with near real-time updates from 2017-current.
Dynamic World (GDW).legends: Water, trees, grass, flooded vegetation, crops, shrub and scrub, built, bare, snow and ice

ESRI-10m Annual LULC.metodologia: U-Net convolutional neural network trained on billions of human-labeled pixels.
ESRI-10m Annual LULC.cobertura: Global coverage with annual or sub-annual updates from 2017-2024.
ESRI-10m Annual LULC.fonte_dados: Sentinel-2 satellite data from Environmental Systems Research Institute (ESRI), Impact Observatory, and Microsoft Maps for Good Initiative.
ESRI-10m Annual LULC.provedor: Environmental Systems Research Institute (ESRI), Impact Observatory, and Microsoft Maps for Good Initiative
ESRI-10m Annual LULC.legends: Built, crops, trees, water, rangeland, flooded vegetation, snow/ice, bare ground, and clouds

FROM-GLC.metodologia: Classificação automática baseada em pixel usando Random Forest e dados multi-temporais.
FROM-GLC.validacao: Validação visual e comparação com produtos existentes. Acurácia de 71%.
FROM-GLC.cobertura: Cobertura global com produtos para diferentes períodos (2010, 2015, 2017).
FROM-GLC.fonte_dados: Landsat TM/ETM+, dados auxiliares de topografia.

Global LULC change 2000 and 2020.metodologia: Supervised machine learning methods (decision and regression trees, U-Net convolutional neural network) and Supervised Machine Learning.
Global LULC change 2000 and 2020.cobertura: Global coverage for years 2000, 2005, 2015 and 2020 with 4-year intervals.
Global LULC change 2000 and 2020.fonte_dados: Landsat series data from University of Maryland (UMD) Global Land Analysis and Discovery (GLAD) laboratory.
Global LULC change 2000 and 2020.provedor: University of Maryland (UMD) Global Land Analysis and Discovery (GLAD) laboratory
Global LULC change 2000 and 2020.legends: Terra firma vegetation cover, wetland, open surface water, snow/ice, cropland, built-up and ocean

Global Pasture Watch (GPW).metodologia: Supervised Machine Learning (random forest, gradient boosted trees, and artificial neural network).
Global Pasture Watch (GPW).cobertura: Global coverage with bi-annual updates from 2000-2022.
Global Pasture Watch (GPW).fonte_dados: Landsat series data from Land & Carbon Lab.
Global Pasture Watch (GPW).legends: Two dominant grassland classes: Cultivated grassland (CG) and natural/semi-natural grassland (NSG), and "other Land Cover" (OLC) class

South America Soybean Maps.metodologia: Combined (regression, visual interpretation, decision tree) methods.
South America Soybean Maps.cobertura: South America coverage with annual updates from 2000-2023 (first map at 2001).
South America Soybean Maps.fonte_dados: Landsat and MODIS series data from University of Maryland (UMD) Global Land Analysis and Discovery (GLAD) laboratory.
South America Soybean Maps.provedor: University of Maryland (UMD) Global Land Analysis and Discovery (GLAD) laboratory

WorldCover 10m 2021.metodologia: Gradient boosting decision tree algorithm applied to Sentinel-1 and Sentinel-2 combined data.
WorldCover 10m 2021.validacao: Reference System (EPSG): 4326. Overall Accuracy: 74.4% (2020 v100), 76.7% (2021 v200).
WorldCover 10m 2021.cobertura: Global coverage with annual updates for 2020-2021.
WorldCover 10m 2021.fonte_dados: Sentinel-1 and Sentinel-2 data from European Space Agency (ESA).
WorldCover 10m 2021.legends: Tree cover, shrubland, grassland, cropland, built-up, bare/sparse vegetation, snow and ice, permanent water bodies, herbaceous wetland, mangroves, moss and lichen

WorldCereal.metodologia: CatBoost algorithm (gradient boosting on decision trees) applied to Sentinel-1, Sentinel-2 and Landsat-8 data.
WorldCereal.validacao: Reference System (EPSG): 4326. Overall Accuracy: 97.8% (Annual crop), 82.5% (Seasonal crop).
WorldCereal.cobertura: Global coverage with annual and seasonal updates for 2021.
WorldCereal.fonte_dados: Sentinel-1, Sentinel-2 and Landsat-8 data from European Space Agency (ESA).
WorldCereal.legends: Temporary (one-year cycle) crops, winter cereals, spring cereals, maize season maize and second season maize

Land Cover CCI.metodologia: Algoritmo de classificação supervisionada usando séries temporais de múltiplos sensores.
Land Cover CCI.validacao: Validação independente com base de dados global. Acurácia de 73%.
Land Cover CCI.cobertura: Série temporal global de 1992 a 2020 com atualizações anuais.
Land Cover CCI.fonte_dados: AVHRR, SPOT-VGT, PROBA-V, MERIS, dados auxiliares.

MODIS Land Cover.metodologia: Algoritmo de classificação supervisionada baseado em boosted decision trees.
MODIS Land Cover.validacao: Validação com dados de campo e interpretação visual. Acurácia de 67%.
MODIS Land Cover.cobertura: Cobertura global anual de 2001 a presente.
MODIS Land Cover.fonte_dados: MODIS Terra e Aqua, dados de reflectância de superfície.

GLC_FCS30.metodologia: Random Forest aplicado a métricas espectrais multi-temporais do Landsat.
GLC_FCS30.validacao: Validação com amostras independentes. Acurácia global de 68%.
GLC_FCS30.cobertura: Cobertura global para 2020 com base em dados Landsat.
GLC_FCS30.fonte_dados: Landsat-8 OLI, dados auxiliares de topografia.

MapBiomas Brasil.metodologia: Supervised Random Forest and U-Net Deep learning algorithms applied to Landsat series data.
MapBiomas Brasil.cobertura: Brazil national territory with annual updates from 1985-2023.
MapBiomas Brasil.fonte_dados: Landsat series data from Non-governmental Organizations, Universities and Technology Companies.
MapBiomas Brasil.provedor: Non-governmental Organizations, Universities and Technology Companies
MapBiomas Brasil.tipo_metodologia: Supervised Random Forest and U-Net Deep Learning
MapBiomas Brasil.legends: Forest, non-forest natural formation, farming, non-vegetated area, water and not observed, and more

PRODES Amazônia.metodologia: Visual Interpretation (PRODES) and Linear Spectral Mixture Model (DETER) applied to multiple satellite data.
PRODES Amazônia.validacao: Reference System (EPSG): 4674. Overall Accuracy: PRODES 93.0%, DETER 93.0%.
PRODES Amazônia.cobertura: Brazilian Amazon region with annual monitoring since 2000-2023, DETER since 2012.
PRODES Amazônia.fonte_dados: IRS, Sentinel-2, Landsat series or CBERS-4/4A (PRODES), MODIS, CBERS series and Amazonia-1 (DETER).
PRODES Amazônia.tipo_metodologia: Visual Interpretation and Linear Spectral Mixture Model
PRODES Amazônia.legends: Deforestation in the year, residual in the year, hydrography, non-forest (only for legal amazon), natural vegetation/forest (PRODES); Deforestation (with bare soil, vegetation and mining), degradation (degradation, wildfire scar) and logging (selective cut type 1 - disordered and selective cut type 2 - geometric) (DETER)

DETER Amazônia.metodologia: Linear Spectral Mixture Model applied to MODIS, CBERS series and Amazonia-1 satellite data.
DETER Amazônia.cobertura: Brazilian Amazon region with annual monitoring since 2012.
DETER Amazônia.fonte_dados: MODIS, CBERS series and Amazonia-1 (DETER) satellite data.
DETER Amazônia.legends: Deforestation (with bare soil, vegetation and mining), degradation (degradation, wildfire scar) and logging (selective cut type 1 - disordered and selective cut type 2 - geometric)

PRODES Cerrado.metodologia: Visual interpretation, Supervised Bhattacharya classifier, time-series classification based on Random Forest and Deep Learning algorithms.
PRODES Cerrado.cobertura: Brazilian Cerrado region with biannual updates for 2018, 2020, 2022.
PRODES Cerrado.provedor: National Institute for Space Research (INPE) and Brazilian Agricultural Research Corporation (Embrapa)
PRODES Cerrado.legends: Primary natural forest vegetation, secondary natural forest vegetation, forestry, pasture, shrub/arboreal pasture, herbaceous pasture, perennial agricultural crops, semi-perennial agricultural crops, temporary agricultural crops of 1 cycle, temporary agricultural crops of more than 1 cycle, temporary agricultural crops, mining, urbanized, other built areas, other uses, not observed, deforestation in the year, non-forest, natural non-forest, body of water

TerraClass Amazônia.metodologia: Visual interpretation, Supervised Bhattacharya classifier, time-series classification based on Random Forest and Deep Learning algorithms.
TerraClass Amazônia.cobertura: Amazon region 2008, 2010, 2012, 2014, 2016, 2018, 2020, 2022 (Amazon) and Cerrado region 2018, 2020, 2022 (Cerrado), both biannual updates.
TerraClass Amazônia.fonte_dados: TM/Landsat-5 and MODIS (older products), 10m (actual products), MSI/Sentinel-2 series (actual products).
TerraClass Amazônia.provedor: National Institute for Space Research (INPE) and Brazilian Agricultural Research Corporation (Embrapa)
TerraClass Amazônia.tipo_metodologia: Visual Interpretation, Supervised Classification and Deep Learning
TerraClass Amazônia.legends: Primary natural forest vegetation, secondary natural forest vegetation, forestry, pasture, shrub/arboreal pasture, herbaceous pasture, perennial agricultural crops, semi-perennial agricultural crops, temporary agricultural crops of 1 cycle, temporary agricultural crops of more than 1 cycle, temporary agricultural crops, mining, urbanized, other built areas, other uses, not observed, deforestation in the year, non-forest, natural non-forest, body of water

IBGE Monitoramento.metodologia: Visual Interpretation applied to Landsat-8 satellite data.
IBGE Monitoramento.validacao: Reference System (EPSG): 4674. Overall Accuracy: Not informed.
IBGE Monitoramento.cobertura: Brazil national coverage with biannual updates since 2010 from 2000-2020.
IBGE Monitoramento.fonte_dados: Landsat-8 satellite data from Brazilian Institute of Geography and Statistics (IBGE).
IBGE Monitoramento.provedor: Brazilian Institute of Geography and Statistics (IBGE)
IBGE Monitoramento.legends: Artificial area, cropland, managed pasture, mosaic of uses in forest area, forestry, forest vegetation, wetland, grassland vegetation, mosaic of uses in grassland, inland water body, coastal water body, bare area

Agricultural Mapping.metodologia: Machine Learning, regression, principal component analysis, visual interpretation applied to multiple satellite data.
Agricultural Mapping.cobertura: Brazil national coverage with variable update frequency by Crop Year.
Agricultural Mapping.fonte_dados: MODIS, Sentinel-2, Landsat Series satellite data from National Supply Company (Conab).
Agricultural Mapping.legends: Summer and winter grains (Cotton, irrigated rice, peanut, oat, canola, rye, barley, bean, corn, soybean, sorghum, wheat, and triticale), coffee, sugar cane, and sugar cane mill
